thread.title: Missing body found on Saddleworth Moor identified
thread.title_full: Missing body found on Saddleworth Moor identified

title: Missing body found on Saddleworth Moor identified
text:
Missing body found on Saddleworth Moor identified 26 January 2017 Close share panel Image copyright PA Image caption The attempts to find out who the man was led to an international police investigation A man whose body was found on Saddleworth Moor more than a year ago has finally been identified. 
A coroner's court in Heywood, near Rochdale, has been told the body found in December 2015 at Dovestone Reservoir was 67-year-old David Lytton. 
The court heard he flew into London Heathrow from Lahore two days before his body was found. He was identified from photos from a passenger list and picked up on CCTV in London. 
Police believe he took his own life.
